lexUnit.name: bend.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to move a body part (usu the head or the extremities) so it forms a curve or angle with the body part it is attached to

sentence.text: With great effort she managed to bend her arm and jab the point of her elbow in the soft pit of his stomach .
You may bend the lower arm a little if you wish .
Christine had to bend her arm down by her side to get her fingers to connect with the keys .
Joe 's swollen lips moved and Patrick bent his head , bringing it close to is friend .
Alexandra bent her head .
Sit on the floor , bend your knees and place the soles of your feet together .
Lie flat on your back , bend the knees , then raise the legs .
` Bend your knees slightly , " he tells Howard .
` You just bend your knees , " he calls down to Rose .
Bend your legs at the knees and swoop your arms down and behind your bottom , in one movement .
Bend your legs a little and punch each arm in front of you , changing arms with each punch .
Whenever you pick up a heavy load , bend both legs .
They bend their heads right back until their faces are entirely open to the sky .
Bend your arms at the elbow to lower body .
Bend the arms at the elbows .
Confidently Sixsmith bent his long body into the booth .
The priest made us sit next to him on footstools ; he bent his red face towards us and whispered that we should become the angels of our homes and his .
It helps to bend your toes upwards towards your knee .
Bend your arms in front of you , so that you are resting some of your weight on your elbows .
In its rough state , he showed it to the Professor , who bent his grey beard over the neat script , and read for some time in silence .
Germany 's merely aristocratic performers happily bent the knee to Kaiser Franz Beckenbauer .
They bent their heads under the lintel and stepped inside .
Lie on your side and bend the lower leg .
I ca n't bend my leg . "
It was beginning to swell and there were signs of bruising , but she could move her fingers , although it hurt when she tried to bend her wrist .
Nina 's upper arm was ringed with red , but she bent her elbow and wriggled her fingers , getting the circulation going again .
Strangers bend their heads together to talk about me .
I bent low over him , a sting in my eyes .
He bent forward to put his arms around me .
Susan bent forward slightly for a better view and saw what it was .
` Bend forward over the table , young woman , and grasp the far edge . "
Rose bent over him with pure attention .
Mr Wolski 's old head bent over Minch and his hands rested gently on her back .
She bent over Rob 's hand and slowly , deftly drew out the sliver of wood .
He bent towards her now .
He bent towards Nicandra .
Under her firm gaze they bent to their machines .
What so many people still do is bend from the waist while keeping their legs straight .
Endill bent down and tried to reach his hand but it was too far away .
She looked so utterly pathetic that I bent down and comforted her silently , stroking her hair , kissing her face .
Then she bent down suddenly .
He bent down and patted Middy .
He got up , bent briefly over her hand .
Dyson bent over the engine again .
Bend over my table !
Bend back right hand at right angles to arm
Sladen bent carefully back in his chair and frowned at the ceiling .
Bend up right foot , curl up toes
Your elbows will bend naturally and you will feel the natural flow of brisk rhythmic walking .
Lily at once bent nearer .
I bent quickly and kissed her .
